title: Mahindra announces new commercial electric four-wheeler 'eZEO'; launch date & other key details here
description: Mahindra Last Mile Mobility Limited (MLMML) has announced its new commercial electric vehicle, named the ‘e-ZEO’. Set to launch on October 3, 2024, the ‘e-ZEO’ stands for "Zero Emission Option," highlighting its environmental benefits. Featuring high-voltage architecture for better efficiency, range, and charging speed, the ‘e-ZEO’ is designed to compete in the small commercial vehicle (SCV) sector.
